thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 4 of 167
thread.title: William Carlton

author: William Carlton
title: William Carlton
text:
I have only recently registered with Trusted Housesitters and, as an experienced sitter, have great admiration for their verification procedures and processes. There are lots of opportunities notified every day.
Why not five stars? While the large number of new notifications are interesting, it would be useful to be able to filter them and/or restrict the countries/dates included.
